title: Sattgruen - Flingern
description: Sattgruen operates multiple restaurants. This outlet switched to all-vegan since 2013. Instead of dairy, it provides soy milk, almond milk, and hazelnut milk for coffee. Serves food on a buffet in two sizes: small or large plate. Selection of hot and cold foods, pasta, salads, vegan cakes and pastries, organic & fair traded coffee and tea. No food between 4-6pm. No a la carte menu. Previously listed as 'Sattgruen - Hoffeldstr'.
